title: Tech Company Scandal
story: uncovered a web of corporate corruption

suspect.name: Dr. Maya Parker
suspect.alibi: Dr. Parker claims she was in her lab developing a new project during the time of the scandal.
suspect.confirmation: A lab technician confirms that Dr. Parker was indeed present in the lab during the time of the scandal.

witness.name: James Anderson
witness.description: He is a junior employee in the company who stumbled upon some confidential files.

npcs.name: Alexis Thompson
npcs.dialogue: Alexis works as an executive in the tech company and denies any involvement in the corruption.

npcs.name: Mark Johnson
npcs.dialogue: Mark, a whistleblower, provides evidence of the corrupt practices and names some high-ranking executives as culprits.

clues.Office Document: A confidential document in the suspect's office implicates several senior executives.
clues.Email Trail: An email thread suggests communication between the culprits and external parties involved in the corruption.
clues.Money Trail: Financial records highlight large sums of money flowing through offshore accounts related to the tech company.
clues.Whistleblower's Recording: A hidden recording from the whistleblower captures a conversation between two executives discussing the corrupt activities.
